CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: PSCs fabricated with the PffBB-n:PC71BM blend , conducted at 80 째C optimized coating temperature , showed relatively high power conversion efficiency ( PCE ) ranging from 8.22 to 9.93% .

Let's think step by step.

1. PffBB-n - This is a "Material Name" entity. It is a type of polymer used in the fabrication of the bulk heterojunction organic solar cells (PSCs).
2. PC71BM - This is another "Material Name" entity. It is a fullerene derivative used in the blend with PffBB-n for the fabrication of the PSCs.

Therefore, the "Material Name" entities in the given paragraph are PffBB-n and PC71BM.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

1. PffBB-n - This is a "Material Name" entity.
2. PC71BM - This is another "Material Name" entity.

I have removed any irrelevant entities and only kept the entities that clearly refer to Material Name, which are PffBB-n and PC71BM.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: PSCs fabricated with the PffBB-n:PC71BM blend , conducted at 80 째C optimized coating temperature , showed relatively high power conversion efficiency ( PCE ) ranging from 8.22 to 9.93% .

Let's think step by step.

1. PSCs: This likely refers to "perovskite solar cells," as it is a common term in the field of solar cell research.
2. PffBB-n:PC71BM: This is a blend of two materials, likely used as the active layer in the perovskite solar cells.
3. 80 째C: This is the optimized coating temperature at which the perovskite solar cells were fabricated.
4. power conversion efficiency (PCE): This is a property name that refers to the efficiency of the solar cells in converting incident light into electrical power.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Property.
1. PCE: This is a material property that refers to the efficiency of the solar cells in converting incident light into electrical power.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: PSCs fabricated with the PffBB-n:PC71BM blend , conducted at 80 째C optimized coating temperature , showed relatively high power conversion efficiency ( PCE ) ranging from 8.22 to 9.93% .

Let's think step by step.

1. PCE: Power conversion efficiency

The paragraph mentions that PSCs (presumably, organic photovoltaic solar cells) fabricated with a specific blend and conducted at an optimized temperature showed a high power conversion efficiency (PCE) ranging from 8.22 to 9.93%. Here, PCE is the "Property Value" entity, as it represents a measurable property of the solar cells.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

1. PCE: Power conversion efficiency (9.93%, 8.22%)

I have removed the irrelevant entities and kept only the "Property Value" entity, which is the power conversion efficiency (PCE) of the solar cells. The values provided are 9.93% and 8.22%.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".
